sentence.Network_en: Mills have iron pillars all over the place holding up the roof.
sentence.Network_cn: 工厂里四处都立有铁柱支撑着房顶。

sentence.Network_en: Shopkeepers would once have been pillars of the Tory establishment.
sentence.Network_cn: 商店店主一度本该成为保守党统治集团的重要支柱。

sentence.Network_en: The pillars rotted away and were replaced.
sentence.Network_cn: 柱子完全腐烂以后换了新的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Comics and animation formed the two pillars of animation industry ., 漫画和动画组成了动漫产业的两大支柱.
Four pillars supported the tent ., 四根柱子支撑着那个帐篷.

shaft piercing 竖井联络巷shaft pillar 井筒保安矿柱shaft raise 暗竖井
建筑词汇英语翻译(O-T) ... pillar 柱 pillar crane 塔式起重机 pilot channel 子槽.

entry.def: A pillar is a tall solid structure, which is usually used to support part of a building.
If something is the pillar of a system or agreement, it is the most important part of it or what makes it strong and successful.

example.ex: The pillar of her economic policy was keeping tight control over money supply.
example.tran: 她经济政策的核心是严格控制货币的供应。
种族隔离制最后的支柱

entry.def: If you describe someone as a pillar of society or as a pillar of the community, you approve of them because they play an important and active part in society or in the community.

example.ex: My father had been a pillar of the community.
example.tran: 我父亲一直是社区的顶梁柱。

auth_sentence.content: I believe in my pillars and I have values.
auth_sentence.res_content: I believe in my pillars and I have values.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I believe in my pillars and I have values.

auth_sentence.content: Even pillars of the business community are wavering.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even pillars of the business community are wavering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even pillars of the business community are wavering.

auth_sentence.content: Men lean against its soaring pillars to smoke.
auth_sentence.res_content: Men lean against its soaring pillars to smoke.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Men lean against its soaring pillars to smoke.
